export default class themeChanger {
    /**
     * @constructor
     */
    constructor() {}
    _addDarkTheme() {
        const darkThemeLinkEl = document.createElement('link')
        darkThemeLinkEl.setAttribute('rel', 'stylesheet')
        darkThemeLinkEl.setAttribute('href', './css/dark.css')
        darkThemeLinkEl.setAttribute('id', 'dark-theme-style')
        const docHead = document.querySelector('head')
        docHead.append(darkThemeLinkEl)
    }
    _removeDarkTheme() {
        const darkThemeLinkEl = document.querySelector('#dark-theme-style')
        const parentNode = darkThemeLinkEl.parentNode
        parentNode.removeChild(darkThemeLinkEl)
    }
    _darkThemeSwitch() {
        const darkThemeLinkEl = document.querySelector('#dark-theme-style')
        if (!darkThemeLinkEl) {
            this._addDarkTheme()
        } else {
            this._removeDarkTheme()
        }
    }
}

classÂ Solution:
Â Â Â Â defÂ findMinStep(self,Â board:Â str,Â hand:Â str)Â ->Â int:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â defÂ backtrack(board):
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ notÂ board:Â returnÂ 0
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â iÂ =Â 0
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ansÂ =Â 6
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â whileÂ iÂ <Â len(board):
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â jÂ =Â iÂ +Â 1
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â whileÂ jÂ <Â len(board)Â andÂ board[i]Â ==Â board[j]:Â jÂ +=Â 1
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ballsÂ =Â 3Â -Â (jÂ -Â i)
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ counter[board[i]]Â >=Â balls:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ballsÂ =Â max(0,Â balls)
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â counter[board[i]]Â -=Â balls
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ansÂ =Â min(ans,Â ballsÂ +Â backtrack(board[:i]Â +Â board[j:]))
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â counter[board[i]]Â +=Â balls
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â iÂ =Â j
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ ans

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â counterÂ =Â collections.Counter(hand)
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ansÂ =Â backtrack(board)
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ -1Â ifÂ ansÂ >Â 5Â elseÂ ans

//Â ReverseÂ reversesÂ theÂ givenÂ stringÂ byÂ eachÂ utf8Â character
funcÂ Reverse(inÂ string)Â stringÂ {
Â Â Â Â nÂ :=Â 0

Â Â Â Â forÂ _,Â rÂ :=Â rangeÂ inÂ {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â rune[n]Â =Â r
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â n++
Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â Â runeÂ =Â rune[0:n]
Â Â Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â n/2;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â rune[i],Â rune[n-1-i]Â =Â rune[n-1-i],Â rune[i]
Â Â Â Â }

}
